author: nc1234
content: Probably need to update this [line](https://github.com/jihoonsong/go-ethereum/blob/fbe00050707590f0fc4485c131a59af83f50342c/eth/catalyst/api.go#L242)  to not throw error for `forks.Osaka`

author: jih2nn
content:
Thanks for the report! I've fixed it and checked Prysm-Geth works after the epoch 3 transition. I've changed NewPayloadV4 and ForkchoiceUpdatedV3 can be called in Osaka.

Please use this one for the EL image: `jihoonsg/geth-focil:cb1773c`
